name: BitdogHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on front porch light”
”Alexa, dim living room light by 10 precent”
”Alexa, increase living room thermostat by 2 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Bitdog turns your Raspberry Pi into a home automation and security hub .Connect the Bitdog Home Skill to your Bitdog Cloud account and start using Alexa to control your home. In order to use this skill you must first sign up at the Bitdog website and follow the getting started guide.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
